review: They are not kidding when they say voice commands really work… This was extremely easy to set up and I have an HDMI splitter to go between my fire TV and DVD.The kids love the video games and the remote control is easy to use.I have my fire TV behind a wood door and the remote works great through that door.I have prime so I can stream movies. I wish there was a search option that only searched prime videos. However, when you voice search, it searches everything.All in all, I am extremely happy with my purchase.
